posts.post_content:
FS: T205 A.A. Mattern SGC Authentic

So a little funny back story on this one.....I cracked this out of some defunct TP grader from days past, clear smaller case/white label.  

It was graded ET-7.  Showed it to a buddy of mine who immediately said ET stands for trimmed.  I scoffed at this and decided to prove him wrong because I figured it might pull at least a 6 at SGC.    

Welp....."So you get what we had here last week -- which is the way he wants it.  Well, he gets it."   LOL

$old

Thanks for stopping by!
Hi Mike - I will take this. Please DM with PP info.
